tool_description: An api that helps you to extract all text in a PDF format file with ease
title: PDF Text Extractor

api_list.name: Intro
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-text-extractor.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-text-extractor.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Extract Text
api_list.description: Upload a file in PDF format, and the text will be automatically extracted and return to you in a list. The length of the list equals to number of pages in the file.
